appName.description: The name of the the extension.

up.description: Message for when shields is enabled

down.description: Message for when shields is disabled

totalBlocked.description: Message showing the amount of all blocked resources

forThisSite.description: Partial string for the phrase `shields is up *for this site*`

enabledMessage.message: I un sitio aparece roto, intenta bajar los escudos
enabledMessage.description: Message telling the user to disable shields if a site appears broken

disabledMessage.message: Usted está navegando por este sitio sin ningún tipo de protección de seguridad o privacidad.
disabledMessage.description: Message telling the user that shields are disabled

blockAds.description: Message indicating the number of ads and trackers blocked

blockPopups.description: Message indicating the number of pop-ups blocked

blockImages.description: Message indicating the number of images blocked

block3partyCookies.description: Message for the select option about cookies blocked, blocking 3rd party cookies

allowAllCookies.message: Todas las cookies han sido permitidas
allowAllCookies.description: Message for the select option about cookies blocked, allowing all cookies

blockAllCookies.description: Message for the select option about cookies blocked, blocking all cookies

blockSomeScripts.message: Algunas secuencias de comandos se han bloqueado
blockSomeScripts.description: Message for the select option about scripts blocked, blocking 3rd party scripts

allowAllScripts.message: Todas las secuencias de comandos han sido permitidas
allowAllScripts.description: Message for the select option about scripts blocked, allowing all scripts

blockAllScriptsOrigins.description: Message for the select option about scripts blocked, blocking all scripts

block3partyFingerprinting.message: Reconocimiento de dispositivos de terceros bloqueado
block3partyFingerprinting.description: Message for the select option about fingerprinting blocked, blocking 3rd party fingerprinting

allowAllFingerprinting.message: El reconocimiento de todos los dispositivos ha sido permitido
allowAllFingerprinting.description: Message for the select option about fingerprinting blocked, allowing all fingerprinting

blockAllFingerprinting.description: Message for the select option about fingerprinting blocked, blocking all fingerprinting

blockPishing.message: Intentos de suplantación de identidad/malware bloqueados
blockPishing.description: Message indicating the number of phishing/malware blocked

connectionsEncrypted.description: Message indicating the number of connections encrypted

editDefaults.message: Valores predeterminados de los escudos globales
editDefaults.description: Message linking shields to the global shield settings

cookiesOnThisSite.description: Message for the cookie resources blocked panel

deviceRecognitionAttempts.description: Message for the device recognition attempts blocked panel

scriptsOnThisSite.message: Secuencias de comandos en este sitio
scriptsOnThisSite.description: Message for the script resources blocked panel

blockedScripts.description: Message for the script resources blocked

allowedScripts.description: Message for the script resources allowed

allowAll.description: Message for the resources blocked *allow all* option

allow.description: Message for the resources blocked *allow* option

allowed.description: Message for the resources blocked *allowed* option

blockAll.description: Message for the resources blocked *block all* option

block.description: Message for the resources blocked *block* option

blocked.description: Message for the resources blocked *blocked* option

apply.description: Message for the button inside dynamic list of resources blocked

applyOnce.description: Message for the dropdown option inside dynamic list of resources blocked to *apply once*

applyUntilRestart.description: Message for the dropdown option inside dynamic list of resources blocked to *apply until restart*

alwaysApply.description: Message for the dropdown option inside dynamic list of resources blocked to *always apply*

undo.description: Message for the resources blocked *undo* option

cancel.description: Message for the button inside the static list of resources blocked to cancel the operation

goBack.description: Message for the button inside the static list of resources blocked to go back from the current screen
